title: The above mentioned professional and the Construction Company including contractor and sub-contractor may take decennial professional liability insurance to cover such liability
clause_text: The above mentioned professional and the Construction Company including contractor and sub-contractor may take decennial professional liability insurance to cover such liability. Form of sanction of development permission, building permission and Commencement certificate. With reference to your application No. …………..dated… for Development

source_pdf.text_snippet: The above mentioned professional and the Construction Company including contractor and sub-contractor may take decennial professional liability insurance to cover such liability.
